title: One month waiting for a refurbished pixel phone
content:
I've returned my Pixel 2xl for warranty replacement, a month ago. But I don't have any information about the refurbished one. It seems like nobody know anything and when I talk to help desk they keep saying to wait another 5 minutes for hours or wait for an email reply until they talk to the "expert team"

My rma number is RMA02428072 
Please someone can help me.
